code.display: NYS Accountable Health Communities (AHC) Health-Related Social Needs Screening (HRSN) tool

item.text: Check populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, resulting in SCN request to update covered population categorization with MCO.

Children Under 18 Years Old with a Chronic Condition

item.text: Check populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient currently receives services that would inhibit ability to deliver any or all NYHER services.

valueCoding.display: Medically Tailored Meals (MTM) In-lieu of Services (ILOS)
Office for Persons with Developmental Disabilities (OPWDD) Waiver

item.text: Check populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient has the required medical necessity that would satisfy requirement to deliver NYHER service.

valueCoding.display: Heat-Related Illness Requiring an ER or UC Visit
Cold-Related Illness Requiring an ER or UC Visit

Last updated: 2024-01-01 00:00:00+0000

Profile: SHINNY Questionnaire Profile

code.display: NYS Accountable Health Communities (AHC) Health-Related Social Needs Screening (HRSN) tool

item.text: Indicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient currently receives or is on any housing waitlists (e.g., HUD. Section 8, local housing authority, or other voucher programs).

code.display: Current Nutritional Education Program Recipient Indicator

item.text: Indicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient currently receives nutritional counseling or education.

code.display: Current Nutritional Education Program Recipient Indicator

item.text: Indicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient is actively engaged in a nutrition program.

code.display: Current Food Service Program Recipient Indicator

item.text: Indicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient currently receives any home-delivered meals or food services.
Indicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment,  identifying if patient is currently engaged in SNAP.
Indicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment,  identifying if patient is currently engaged in WIC.
Indicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment,  identifying if patient is currently engaged in TANF.
Indicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment,  identifying if patient is currently engaged in Transportation services.

Indicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment,  identifying if patient is currently prescribed medication, requiring refrigeration for the management of a chronic condition.

Indicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment,  identifying if patient is a pregnant/postpartum persons that require a refrigeration for breast milk.
Indicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment,  identifying if patient meets the qualifications for medical respite (see notes).
Indicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment,  identifying if patient needs assistance with childcare.
